channel.title: Various Questions
channel.description:
Hey guys,
I've been through most of the sections here in the server area and after exploring for a good while and trying quite a few different servers and clients, I want to ask some questions. When it says "project insanity" or "delta" what exactly are those? and which one of those is going to get me closer to the actual runescape that we know today, like that has primal and claws, things like that. I know that this question may be looked down at, but trust me I have been looking all day and this is not the only day I have spent searching for the right server. So if you guys know of any good servers that you would recomend me to check out, please post em here! and please try to answer my questions about delta and project insanity terms.
Thanks guys, also if this is in the wrong section let me know.

item.title: Various Questions
item.dc:creator: @JCor9 JCor9
item.description:
@JCor9 wrote:

You posted this in the wrong section, but i will still attempt to help you. These names you see are Bases or what the original source was before who ever it was added there content and released. Theres alot more than just Delta and Project insanity those are just what everybody uses because there very easy to run and take very little skill to program. But there are alot more than those as i said, and most of them are much better to use for example. RuneSource & Hyperion are Properly Programmed servers that are more difficult to program but will be better for you in the long run. Shard is also a very good base to use for beginners as it would teach you packaging and is already somewhat filled with content. Now Delta and PI are basically your two worse choices as Delta has everything crammed into one file, It also uses thread per client which means it creates a new thread every time a new player logs in which slows down the server alot, and its not packaged. Project Insanity use to be a Alright base to use before every one started telling people to switch from delta to it, but what none of them realized is that it wasn't the base that was so bad it was the fact that all the people wanted to do was take credits for others work. now everybody does the same thing with Project insanity i rarely ever see any "unique content" in project insanity servers but it is packaged which will help you and it is the most content heavy base so that would be the answer to you question.

I agree with 100% pi is over used and delta just sucks, but im currenty make a pi that is unique very much iv been coding for 3 months now and loveandpower that picture is extremly funny

Read full topic

item.description:
@Prometheusx9 wrote:

[quote=“JCor9, post:3, topic:401402”]Delta
Older more like runescape back in like 06ish i would say becouse it doesnt have and skillcape emotion, claw ect
Easyer for coding

Project Insanity [pi]
Can be made like current runescape has claws and skillcape emotions
Harder to code but lots of tut (what im coding right now)

400+ servers
Looks the most like runescape wont get much closer
Hardest to code not as much tuts

And its in the wrong section this should have gone in Server Help

Edit: Common used Server https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,487174.0.html[/quote]

ok thanks you for the feedback, im still trying to learn everything, and i will keep in mind that questions like these go there! thanks again!

item.title: Various Questions
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

Well, I’m not too sure really how exactly to explain what PI’s and Delta’s are. I can tell you they’re a type of server, and they’re both 317’s. 317’s do not have dragon claws, primal armor, or any of that stuff unless it has customs added to it. If you want something that looks more like RuneScape today, you want a server that’s probably 508+ so that you can have those items and they’re already added in and have newer looking graphics.

Read full topic
